price: 他们以前的各民族也像这样，每有一个使者来临他们，他们就说：“他是一个术士，或是一个疯人。”
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُواْ سَاحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٌ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika mā atā alladhīna min qablihim min rasūlin illā qālū sāḥirun aw majnūnun
